item.title: Go - Embed
item.description: Go 1.16 added a new embed package. While the idea is not a novelty, there were already some packages with slightly different APIs fulfilling similar roles, for example: go-bindata go-rice Having an official package is always a welcome addition to the batteries-included standard library. Usage A possible way to embed react assets could be as simple as: package web import ( "embed" "io/fs" ) //go:embed build/* var content embed.FS And serving assets using http.
